original_title: El Guerrero del Asfalto Contra los piratas Radioactivos
overview: "The warrior of the asphalt against the radioactive pirates" this short film was never edited, only its "raw" material was left on a cassette from the old Sony Video 8 cameras, a camera that stopped working and this was buried there forever... .until now.
title: The Asphalt Warrior Against the Radioactive Pirates
